rule: The output must classify a given input text into one and only one of the following specific categories: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech.
input: UN condemns North Korea's latest missile test
complianceText:
No violation. The output consists of a category, "World", which complies with the categories specified in the chatbot description: World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech. The output exhibits the expected format for classifying a news article, as no specific input text is necessary to be verified for correctness, only compliance with format and category list is checked.

OK
